link.title: Support | Insurance and Group Plans | Manulife

meta.content: Support | Insurance and Group Plans | Manulife
Support | Insurance and Group Plans | Manulife

li.a: Travel insurance policies and product summaries
Creditor insurance Certificates and product summaries

a.aria-label: Manulife Bank open in new window

li.a: Request a search for lost or unclaimed account
Plans for small and large businesses
Plans for small and large businesses

How to set up an application
How to set up an application
How to set up an application
Introducing the new Manulife group retirement website

a.aria-label: Travel insurance policies and product summaries

li.a: Travel insurance policies and product summaries

a.aria-label: Creditor insurance Certificates and product summaries

li.a: Creditor insurance Certificates and product summaries

a.aria-label: Investments opens in a new tab
Manulife Bank opens in a new tab
Request a search for lost or unclaimed account

li.a: Request a search for lost or unclaimed account

div.p: Visit these resources for information on top-searched subjects (e.g., signing in, claims, forms)
Manulife ID One secure way to log in to Manulife accounts. Find log-in support and information at our support centre.
Need to start a claim or follow up on one? Sign in to your account to get started. Have questions about claims, coordination of benefits, and more?
Search a listing of frequently-used forms for group benefits, insurance (e.g., life or health and dental) and group retirement.

mux-cta.aria-label: Manulife Bank support opens in a new tab

div.p: Find answers to questions about insurance coverage, claims, group benefits, travel insurance and more.

button.span: What services does my health and dental plan cover?

div.p: To see what services your plan covers:

li.a: Sign in to your plan on the website.

ol.li: Find and click onCoveragein the left navigation.
UnderYour Benefits, click onView Benefits Booklet.

div.p: If your plan does not include an online Benefits Booklet, your plan administrator at work may be able to supply you with information about services your plan covers. You may also contact our Customer Service Centre to inquire about coverage for a specific type of expense.
To see what services your plan covers:

li.a: Sign in to your plan on the website.

ol.li: Find and click on Contract and benefits.
Follow the prompts to review your plan coverage.

div.h3: Costco, alumni or professional association members
div.p: To see what services your plan covers:

li.a: Sign in to your plan on the website.

ol.li: Find and click on Contract and benefits.
Follow the prompts to review your plan coverage.

button.span: How can I tell if you received/processed my claim?

div.p: Your most recent claims are listed on the website and in the app.On the website, each claim includes a progress bar on the right side of each claim listing. The progress bar indicates where a claim is in the review process.
div.h4: To see your most recently processed claims:

li.a: Sign in to your plan on the website.

ol.li: Recent claims are shown on the home page.
Sign in to your plan on the app.
ClickClaimsat the bottom of your screen to find your recent claims.

li.a: Sign in to your plan on the website.

ol.li: Find and click onClaimsin the left navigation, then click onClaims Hub. A listing of your claims appears. You can also find theClaims Hubin the upper right corner of your home page, underCommon Tasks.
To find a specific claim, use the filters at the top of the list.

div.p: This feature is not available on the app.
div.h3: For Individual Health and Dental Insurance
div.p: Your most recent claims are listed on the website after you sign in. To see your most recent ones:

li.a: Sign in to your plan on the website.

ol.li: Recent claims are shown on the home page.

div.h3: For Costco, alumni or professional association members
div.p: Your most recent claims are listed on the website after you sign in. To see your most recent ones:

li.a: Sign in to your plan on the website.

ol.li: Recent claims are shown on the home page.

button.span: How do I apply for prior authorization for a prescription drug?

div.p: We need to approve certain drugs for coverage before you get your prescription filled. To apply forprior authorization, print and complete theDrug Prior Authorization form.

button.span: My spouse has group benefits through their employer. Can they submit claims through the benefit plan I have with my employer too?

p.em: Firstly, we would like to state that every group benefits plan is unique to each employer and insurer. The information we provide here is therefore general in nature, and subject to the terms and conditions of each individual plan.

div.p: Spouses may have separate benefits plans through their separate employers. If they are set up on their plans as having coordination of benefits with each other, they can make group benefits claims to their own and each others plans, provided they are cited as spouses of the other on their account. Manulife has published a page oncoordination of benefits. This resource explains how to make a claim for yourself, how your spouse can make a claim, and how to make a claim for a child.

In practice, when one person needs to make a claim, they will submit the claim to their employers group benefits provider first. Then, once that claims completed, if there are any outstanding amounts, they can submit that amount to their spouses employers plan. In this way, a plan member may be reimbursed up to 100% of the cost for the service or item.

Once a couple becomes registered on each others group benefits plans, claim payments involving both plans may start to happen automatically. For example, for regular dental appointments, once the dentist has your particulars, they may submit claims immediately to your provider, and then to your spouses provider, without you needing to take any independent action.

For easier group benefits plan management, anytime, anywhere, consider downloading theManulife Mobile app. Available through the Apple App Store or the Google Play store for Android, its the only app you need to manage your group benefits plan. Through the app you can submit your claims, review statements, check benefits balances, find health care providers near you, and more.
Apple and App Store are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries and regions.

button.span: I understand the amount a group benefits provider will reimburse me for a claim is based on whats considered a reasonable and customary amount. What does that mean?

p.em: Firstly, we would like to state that every group benefits plan is unique to each employer and insurer. The information we provide here is therefore general in nature, and subject to the terms and conditions of each individual plan.

div.p: Reasonable and customary (R + C) describes the amount a group benefits provider (i.e. insurer) would expect a health, dental or extended health care provider to charge one of their members for a service. The insurance company establishes those amounts considered a realistic and expectedcharge for a service as a starting point for settling claims.
Based on what that R + C amount is, the insurance provider then determines how much of what a member is claiming will be covered, according to that members plan.

Expense amounts are subject to R + C limitations because fees across different geographical locations vary. In addition, some health care providers charge more than others for the same service, due to individual fee schedules
Insurance companies adjudicate claims based on what they determine as the standard amount charged for a particular service, according to:

ul.li: the prevailing rate for that service provincially
fee guides for a specific profession under its regulatory body (e.g., dental fee guide, medical association guide)

div.p: For easier group benefits plan management, anytime, anywhere, consider downloading theManulife Mobile app. Available through the Apple App Store or the Google Play store for Android, its the only app you need to manage your group benefits plan. Through the app you can submit your claims, review statements, check benefits balances, find health care providers near you, and more.
Apple and App Store are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries and regions.

button.span: Does my provincial health insurance cover travel abroad?

div.p: Provincial or territorial government health insurance plans may pay only a small portion of medical expenses incurred abroad. They might not pay for ambulance services, prescription drugs, fees charged by private hospitals or facilities or emergency dental treatment. In addition, many hospitals abroad may require immediate cash payment or proof of insurance, which our assistance centre would help coordinate.

button.span: Can I purchase your travel insurance plans after booking my trip?

div.p: Yes, most plans may be purchased up to and including the date of departure. However, our Cancel For Any Reason Rider, which is an add-on available when purchasing a plan with Trip Cancellation and Interruption coverage, must be purchased within 7 days of booking your trip.

For Trip Cancellation and Interruption protection, we recommend maximizing your length of coverage and purchasing as soon as possible, in the event you need to cancel your trip. Same recommendation applies when purchasing our Government Health Travel Advisory Rider. This is so you are protected for emergency medical expenses related to a specific virus or disease if the government issues a Avoid non-essential travel advisory before your departure date. This add-on is available when purchasing a plan with Emergency Medical coverage.

div.h2: Do you have the Manulife mobile app?

div.h3: For your group benefits account, you can:

ul.li: Submit or check on the status of a claim
Download a digital copy of your group benefits card

div.h3: For your group retirement account, you can:

ul.li: Review your account balance and history, rates of return, and more

img.alt: Download on the Apple App Store

div.p: Scan the QR code with your mobile device and download the app! Or, visit our resource page to learn more.
Rest assured our team is here to support you.
Youre a Manulife customer and need to contact us.

a.aria-label: Find a phone number or email address for customers and members

div.a: Find a phone number or email address

div.p: Youre a business administrator and need to contact us.

a.aria-label: Find a phone number or email address for business sponsors and administrators

div.a: Find a phone number or email address

a.aria-label: Group plans formerly with Standard Life
a.span: Group plans formerly with Standard Life
